mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS id, r.title AS title, r.img AS img, r.content AS content, r.created_at AS createdAt, u.nick_name AS nickName, a.title AS `attraction` FROM review_board AS r JOIN user AS u ON (r.user = u.id) JOIN attraction AS a ON (r.attraction = a.id) WHERE r.id = #{id}
